cat.lump.aq.textextraction.wikipedia.cli

Class WikipediaCliCategoryDepth

  • java.lang.Object
    • cat.lump.aq.textextraction.wikipedia.cli.WikipediaCliMinimum
      • cat.lump.aq.textextraction.wikipedia.cli.WikipediaCliCategoryDepth

  • public class WikipediaCliCategoryDepth
extends WikipediaCliMinimum
    CLI to access directly the estimation of the category depth step of Xecutor pipeline for the WikiTailor category-based in-domain comparable corpora extraction. (step 4 of the Xecutor).
    Author:
    cristina
